participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Active and energetic, enjoys fitness and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: i go to the gym regularly. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i've short hair. eating is something i do when i'm bored. two dogs live with me.

participant_2.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school.
